item.description:
The tour of the Egyptian collection at the Museum of Fine Arts has been rescheduled to Wednesday, November 17, 2010 (MFA closed early on November 10 due to the upcoming opening of the new wing).

Join us for a mythical and symbolic exploration of the MFA's Egyptian Collection.
We will explore some of the great myths and mysteries of Egypt, as well as discuss the unique perspective of the Egyptians on life and death and the their role within the universe.

The museum entrance on Wednesday is free, however we do ask for a $5 fee for the tour.

We will meet in the new Sharf Visitor Center between the newly opened Fenway Entrance and the Rotundra on the first floor.
We would like to begin at 6:45 p.m. sharp so please arrive a little early.

p.s. Please note that this is a meetup originally scheduled for November 10, but was moved by a week due to the Museum's early closing.

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: **RESCHEDULED** To November 17: MFA TOUR OF EGYPTIAN COLLECTION
